title: Summer School Open4Tech
text:
The Department of Computer Science within the Faculty of Sciences at the University of Craiova, in collaboration with the “Society for Computer Technologies” Association and companies Caphyon, Chenist Cybersecurity, Netrom Software si Syncro Soft, is organizing the Open4Tech - Summer School 2024.
The courses will take place from June 24 to July 12, 2024, and are intended for students and high school pupils passionate about computer science.


I will teach you on how to navigate the cybersecurity landscape
Join our intensive 4-hour course designed specifically students eager to explore the world of cybersecurity. This hands-on course will equip you with the essential skills and knowledge to navigate the complex cybersecurity landscape effectively.
What You’ll Learn:

Understanding Cyber Threats: Gain insights into common cyber threats and how they impact individuals and organizations.
Safe Internet Practices: Learn best practices for safe browsing, including identifying phishing attempts and avoiding malicious websites.
Data Protection: Discover methods to protect your personal information and data from cyber attacks.
Basic Cyber Hygiene: Implement basic cybersecurity measures to safeguard your devices and online presence.
Practical Scenarios: Engage in interactive exercises and real-world scenarios to apply what you’ve learned.

Difficulty: beginner
Format: 2 sessions x 2h
RSVP

title: Course for Summer School Open4Tech
text:
Thank you Mr. Mirel Cosulschi for the invitation to participate in this edition of the Open4tech Summer School 2024.
Our training on “how to navigate the cybersecurity landscape” consists in a 2 sessions x 2h format. The first part of the course it will take today, 27th of June.
Before we begin, who are we?



CHENIST Academy - part of CHENIST Cybersecurity


We will teach you on how to navigate the cybersecurity landscape, step by step.
What You’ll Learn In This 4 hours Course:

Understanding Cyber Threats: Gain insights into common cyber threats and how they impact individuals and organizations.
Safe Internet Practices: Learn best practices for safe browsing, including identifying phishing attempts and avoiding malicious websites.
Data Protection: Discover methods to protect your personal information and data from cyber attacks.
Basic Cyber Hygiene: Implement basic cybersecurity measures to safeguard your devices and online presence.
Practical Scenarios: Engage in interactive exercises and real-world scenarios to apply what you’ve learned.

Now, let’s explore the world of cybersecurity together for the first section of the course:
1st hour [Cyber Awareness]:

GKTNEO
What is Cybersecurity?
How can cybersecurity and the lack of it can affect you [Cyber Risks]?
“You have nothing to hide?” - and other myths
Data leaks and you (haveibeenpwnd.com)
Who are the main cyber actors?
What can you do to improve your cyber resilience?
Q&A

2nd hour [Cyber Hygiene]:

What is Cyber Hygiene?
What can you do to improve your C.H.?
Browsing / Passwords / Encryption / VMs / Specific setups
Q&A

If you haven’t RSVP already, I think you can still do it.

Poti citi in curand varianta in romana a articolului, aici.

Configuration management and hardening of Unix servers for secure, reliable, declarative and reproducible systems

Security by design for data at rest and data in movement

title: Scoala de Vara - Open4Tech
text:
Departamentul de Informatica din cadrul Facultatii de Stiinte, Universitatea din Craiova si Asociatia “Societatea pentru Tehnologii Computationale - Society for Computer Technologies impreuna cu companiile Caphyon, Chenist Cybersecurity, Netrom Software si Syncro Soft oganizeaza scoala de vara Open4Tech - Summer School 2024.
Cursurile se vor desfasura in perioada 24 iunie - 12 iulie 2024 si sunt adresate studentilor si elevilor pasionati de informatica.



Logo





Logo


Te voi invata cum sa navighezi in peisajul securitatii cibernetice.
Alatura-te cursului nostru intensiv de 4 ore, conceput special pentru studenti dornici sa exploreze lumea securitatii cibernetice. Acest curs practic te va echipa cu abilitatile si cunostintele esentiale pentru a naviga eficient in peisajul complex al securitatii cibernetice.
Ce vei invata:

Intelegerea Amenintarilor Cibernetice: Dobandeste perspective asupra amenintarilor cibernetice comune si a modului in care acestea afecteaza indivizii si organizatiile.
Practici Sigure pe Internet: Invata cele mai bune practici pentru navigare sigura, inclusiv identificarea tentativelor de phishing si evitarea site-urilor malitioase.
Protectia Datelor: Descopera metode de protejare a informatiilor personale si a datelor impotriva atacurilor cibernetice.
Igiena Cibernetica de Baza: Aplica masuri de securitate cibernetica de baza pentru a-ti proteja dispozitivele si prezenta online.
Scenarii Practice: Participa la exercitii interactive si scenarii reale pentru a aplica ceea ce ai invatat.

Dificultate: incepator
Format: 2 sesiuni x 2h

You can read the English version of the article, here.
